name: Aloha Startups
overview:
Starting up kama’aina Startups. We are a group of young local Entrepreneurs and Startup enthusiast. Our mission is to uncover and highlight local Startups, Entrepreneurs and Events. We Love Startups and we Love Hawaii.

Aloha Startups is a Hawaii-based group of entrepreneurs, technologists and professionals dedicated to connecting, growing, and bringing attention to Hawaii’s startup community. Through thought-provoking articles on startups and entrepreneurs, opinions on issues, and in-depth profiles of ideas, entrepreneurs, and events, Aloha Startups’ original content highlights the successes, failures, and challenges facing Hawaii’s newest high tech businesses. Our goals are to:

  • Increase awareness of the people, businesses, and events energizing Hawaii’s startup community,
  • Identify, highlight, and help to solve the challenges and gaps facing Hawaii’s tech entrepreneurs,
  • Give Hawaii’s entrepreneurs a voice to influence relevant decision-makers,
  • Connect entrepreneurs and those interested in becoming entrepreneurs in Hawaii.
